name: Tomb Lord

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally DEF in Arena by 42%

skills.name: Crippling Blows
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy 3 times. Places a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff on the target for 2 turns if this attack is critical.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%

skills.name: Death Burst
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 70% chance of placing four 5% [Poison] debuffs on all enemies for 1 turn if the hit is critical
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Blight
skills.raw_description:
Resets the Turn Meter of all enemies with less than 50% HP. Has an 80% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff on all enemies for 2 turns. Also has an 80% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff on all enemies for 2 turns.
Gets an Extra Turn if an enemy's Turn Meter is Reset by this skill
Lvl. 2 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

faction.name: Knight Revenant
faction.default_description: Knight Revenant is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 34 champions

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: Knight Revenant is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 22 champions. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

faction.raw_description: Disciples of the K'leth death cult, the Knights Revenant see themselves as vessels of the spirits of the dead of their order. They raid indiscriminately to capture slaves to support themselves and as ritual sacrifices. Upon initiation, devotees surrender their bodies to the spirits of dark warriors.

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: Tomb Lord is a legendary assist champion from the faction Knight Revenant doing spirit damage. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

structured_data.description: Member of the faction Knight Revenant, Tomb Lord is a champion of Legendary rarity and of Assist type
structured_data.name: Tomb Lord

default_description: Tomb Lord is a legendary assist champion from the faction Knight Revenant doing spirit damage
